entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Version conflict during compilation #57882
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add method TryFormat for Enum #57881
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile due to CS8795 error with file-scoped namespaces #57880
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Task.Delay 100x slower on mono than coreclr on macOS #57877
    tenet-performance, untriaged, area-Threading-mono
  • profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #57875
    arch-arm32, disabled-test, os-linux, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, untriaged

Closed

  • DataContractJsonSerializer can't serialize contract with ExtensionDataObject #55270
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • OpenSSL 3.0 has removed `ERR_GET_FUNC` #57674
    area-System.Security, blocking-release, os-linux, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Further reduce Linq usage in ComponentModel.Annotations #57897
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, untriaged
  • Possible .NET optimization opportunities for an accumulated multiply-add loop #56855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, optimization, Priority:2, 7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json support to System.Runtime.Serialization #29975
    area-System.Text.Json, Future
  • [API Proposal]: RegexOptions.Constrained #57891
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, api-ready-for-review, 7.0.0
  • SocketException: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host. .net core #57895
    area-System.Net, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add a GetDebuggerDisplay() to Object #57887
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged
  • Getting rid of ImmutableArray<T>.IsDefault ? #26829
    area-System.Collections, Future
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-103298-.NET7 #57892
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-runtime-.NET 6, runtime #runtime-101520-.NET6 #57259
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 1 #runtime-102558-.NET6RC1 #57711
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • User Story: .NET 7.0 developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #57797
    area-Meta, User Story, Priority:2, Cost:L, Bottom Up Work, Team:Libraries, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/2] Race between reading response and reset? #57617
    bug, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Hang when reading response data #57888
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged
  • Http server performance regression in net6 preview 7 #57656
    area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, tenet-performance, untriaged
  • Support Unicode Script character classes in regular expressions #57038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, up-for-grabs, feature request, Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(constIndOffset % elemSize) == 0' #57856
    arch-arm32, disabled-test, os-linux, JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, untriaged
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'false' in src/coreclr/jit/earlyprop.cpp Line: 199 #57774
    disabled-test, os-linux, JitStress, arch-x64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, in pr, 7.0.0
  • Test failure:Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_34094\\Test34094\\Test34094.cmd #57458
    arch-x86, disabled-test, os-linux, os-windows, JitStress, arch-x64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs further triage, in pr, 7.0.0
  • Maybe spin-waits in the thread pool can be tuned better for arm/arm64 #39559
    arch-arm64, area-System.Threading, in pr, 7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change behaviour of Setting SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize (Or add documentation) #57859
    documentation, area-System.Security, untriaged
  • [mono] Implement Environment.GetFolderPath for Android #35490
    blocking-release, os-android, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.0
  • Enum.ToString is slower than explicit implementation #57748
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, untriaged
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize is intolerably slow in Blazor WebAssembly, but very fast in .NET Core integration test #40386
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • SerialPort error on Virtual Serial Port for USB #30877
    area-System.IO, os-windows, up-for-grabs, Future
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-102478-.NET7 #57710
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Regions] pCorProfilerInfo->GetObjectGeneration may fail when running under USE_REGIONS #55965
    area-GC-coreclr, in pr, 7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Request fewer threads in the thread pool #57885
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Align DCJS with 4.8 implementation. #57884
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Align DCJS with 4.8 implementation. #57883
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0] Stop using ERR_GET_FUNC, since it has been removed in OSSL3 Beta2. #57879
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • Stabilize runtime-coreclr pipelines (round 1) #57788
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Align DCJS with 4.8 implementation. #57533
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Stop using ERR_GET_FUNC, since it has been removed in OSSL3 Beta2. #57869
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Disable TaskDropsExecutionContextUponCompletion test #57864
    area-System.Threading
  • Disable TaskDropsExecutionContextUponCompletion test #57863
    area-System.Threading
  • Remove IsZapped and GetZappedModule functions #57823
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Replace Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation with Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility Package #57783

Updated

  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Propagate BBF flags during hoisting #57825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix `StringSegment.Buffer` can be null #57858
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Improve morphing of comparisons #54204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Replace constant strings with SyntaxKind #57898
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add event to RuntimeEventSource for AppContext switches #57847
  • Remove stray #nullable disable from SkipLocalsInit.cs #57889
  • MonoAOTCompiler: Check for proxy file's target only when the cache is… #57865
    area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #57854
    community-contribution
  • handle special error event #57804
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • Remove more ngen-related dead code and config vars #57874
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove ZapSig::EncodeField as it is unused. #57845
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix GetGenerationBounds under USE_REGIONS #57101
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove PlainPointer, RelativePointer and RelativeFixupPointer #57707
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
